snippet: Michael Grimm, a former Marine who is under a tax-fraud indictment, is being challenged by Domenic M. Recchia Jr., a Democrat and former linebacker.
abstract: Domenic M Recchia Jr, a former linebacker, is the Democratic challenger to Republican Rep Michael G Grimm of Staten Island, a former Marine who is under a tax-fraud indictment; New York City's power brokers are banking on Recchia's old-school Brooklyn bearing to neutralize Grimm's own outer borough credentials.
lead_paragraph: Michael Grimm, a former Marine who is under a tax-fraud indictment, is being challenged by Domenic M. Recchia Jr., a Democrat and former linebacker.

headline.seo: Domenic Recchia Answers Call to Unseat Representative Michael Grimm
headline.main: Staten Island’s Tough-Guy Congressman Faces Somebody His Own Size
headline.print_headline: Tough Guy Gets a Matching Foe on Staten Island
